General.Name: InsuraGuest Technologies Inc
General.Description: InsuraGuest Technologies Inc. operates as a software-as-a service based company. The company offers insurtech, a proprietary insurance and technology software that embedded with vacation rental, hotels, sports, and ticketed events sectors to deliver rental and event based digital insurance products. It also offers agency/broker software platform to insurance agents and brokers. The company was formerly known as Manado Gold Corp. and changed its name to InsuraGuest Technologies Inc. in February 2020. The company was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Salt Lake City, Utah.
